name: Heat'n Hit
description:
Controls:

  • WASD: Move character
  • Space: Jump
  • Mouse: Aim
  • Mouse Wheel or 1, 2 and 3 keys: Change weapon
  • Left Click or Control: Shoot

Be careful! The weapons heat with every shot gaining damage, and cools down when you don't shoot. If you overuse a heated gun it will end up breaking and being unusable for a while. After some time when it cools down it can be used again.

The key to victory is keeping the guns heated but avoiding breaking them.
